title: Fresh Step Outstretch Advanced Long Lasting Clumping Litter with Febreze Freshness, Activated Charcoal Litter Lasts 50% Longer, 32 lbs. (2 x 16 lb. Box)
description: Change your cat's litter less often and enjoy advanced odor control with Fresh Step Outstretch Advanced Long Lasting Clumping Litter with Febreze freshness (1). Innovative microgranule technology absorbs 50% more liquid and odor, so the litter lasts 50% longer and requires less changing (1). With Febreze freshness and 6X activated charcoal, this cat litter gives you Fresh Step's longest-lasting odor control with a 15-day odor control guarantee (2,3). This Fresh Step clumping cat litter traps cat urine at the surface to form tight clumps with fewer crumbles, making scooping and cleaning the kitty litter box a breeze. Made using smooth particles, this Fresh Step litter has a low-dust formula and is gentle on paws for easy digging and ultimate comfort. One 16-lb. box of Fresh Step Outstretch cat litter lasts as long as 24 lbs. of Fresh Step Multi-Cat Litter, so you can use less litter. Enjoy more catnaps and cuddle time with your kitty when you choose Fresh Step cat litter. (1) vs. Fresh Step Multi-Cat (2) vs. other Fresh Step clumping clay litter (3) See package for more information on terms and conditions
